attributes.title: Reviving Hinduism - Not By Revolution, But by Evolution - Through Non-Violence!
attributes.description:
3 MAY 2020 
*TODAY IS THE NINTH DAY OF CHITHIRAI BRAHMOTSAVAM CELEBRATIONS IN ALL THE SARVAJNAPEETHAS ALL OVER THE WORLD.

*TODAY, PARASHAKTI MEENAKSHI IS GRACING IN SARVA ALANKARA ADORNED IN AMLANA MALA. NITHYANANDESHWARA PARAMASHIVA SOMASUNDARESHWARA IS GRACING IN SARVA ALANKARA IN SWARNA RISHABHA VAHANA. TODAY IS THE LEELA OF DIGVIJAYA WHERE FINALLY, MEENAKSHI PARASHAKTI IS DIRECTLY TAKING PARAMASHIVA HIMSELF, ONE-ON-ONE IN MAHAKAILASA! INSTEAD OF WAGING WAR, SHE FINALLY MERGES WITH HIM IN LOVE AND ONENESS. LET US FIRST OFFER WORSHIP TO PARAMASHIVA AND PARASHAKTI MEENAKSHI PARAMPARA.

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*I WILL REVIVE HINDUISM. I AM A HINDU REVIVALISM, NOT BY ANY REVOLUTION BUT BY EVOLUTION AND SETTING MODEL COMMUNITIES - KAILASA ENLIGHTENMENT ECOSYSTEMS, SARVAJNAPEETHAS ALL OVER THE WORLD.

*I AM NOT GOING TO GET INTO CONFLICT OR WAR OR I AM NOT GOING TO WAGE WAR WITH EXISTING OLD INFRASTRUCTURES OF HINDUISM ANYONE. I AM NOT INTERESTED IN ANY OF IT. I AM GOING TO REVIVE HINDUISM, BUT BY SETTING UP A MODEL COMMUNITY - ENLIGHTENMENT ECOSYSTEM - WHICH I AM GOING TO CREATE ABSOLUTELY FROM THE SCRATCH - NEW, TEMPLE-BASED, HINDU ANCIENT ENLIGHTENMENT ECOSYSTEM AND CIVILIZATIONS BASED ON THAT.

*KAILASA IS REVIVING THE ANCIENT HINDU ENLIGHTENED CIVILIZATION. PARAMASHIVA HIMSELF MANIFESTED THIS KAILASA MANDALA - THE ENLIGHTENMENT ECOSYSTEM AND THE LIFESTYLE. I AM GOING TO REVIVE THIS WHOLE ENLIGHTENMENT ECOSYSTEM KAILASA BY CREATING MODERN KAILASAS ALL OVER THE WORLD.

*I WANT ALL MY DISCIPLES AND THE NITHYANANDA SANGHA TO KNOW THIS IMPORTANT THING: WE ARE NOT GOING TO WAR WITH ANYONE. WE ARE NOT INTERESTED IN VIOLENCE, CONFLICT, CONTRADICTION. WE ARE NOT GOING TO GRAB ANYBODY’S TEMPLE OR ANY PROPERTY. I WILL WORK SINCERELY AND INVOKE PARAMASHIVA, TO MANIFEST IN ME AND ALL DISCIPLES AND DEVOTEES WHO WANT TO MANIFEST PARAMASHIVA AND REVIVE THIS SPIRITUAL SCIENCE WHICH IS THE CORE OF THE ENLIGHTENMENT ECOSYSTEM - MAKING YOU ALL MANIFEST THE STATE, SPACE, POWERS, BEING AND SUPERCONSCIOUSNESS AND KAILASA OF PARAMASHIVA AND MAKING ALL OF US GATHER, AND EVOLVE THE ENLIGHTENMENT ECOSYSTEM ALL OVER THE WORLD.

*WE NEED NOT GATHER IN ONE PLACE. NOW I AM AVAILABLE FOR EVERYONE EVERYWHERE! WE CAN BE AS POWERFUL AN ECOSYSTEM OF KAILASA IN A REMOTE VILLAGE IN TAMILNADU LIKE PATTANAM OR SEERAGAPADI OR IN A REMOTE VILLAGE IN SOUTH AFRICA OR BRAZIL OR UTTAR PRADESH OR NEPAL OR CANADA, BECAUSE I AM AVAILABLE 24X7 TO ALL OF YOU.

*ALL WE NEED IS PEOPLE WHO ARE INSPIRED AND REALLY WANT TO MANIFEST PARAMASHIVA, WHO ARE READY TO HOLD PARAMASHIVA IN THEIR INNER SPACE AND MANIFEST THE STATE, SPACE, POWERS, BEING, SUPERCONSCIOUSNESS AND KAILASA OF PARAMASHIVA.

*ALL WAR, CONFLICTS ARE LIFE-NEGATIVE. EVEN THE PERSON WHO WINS THE WAR WOULD HAVE WASTED HIS LIFE WINNING THE WAR. THAT IS WHY I WITHDREW MYSELF FROM THE WAR THAT THE ANTI-HINDU MAFIA, AND ANTI-GURU HINDU MAFIA WERE TRYING TO DRAG ME INTO THROUGH ASSASSINATION ATTEMPTS AND LAWFARE. EVEN IF I WIN THE WAR IN THE END, MY LIFE WOULD HAVE BEEN A BIG FAILURE BECAUSE BY THE TIME I WIN THE WAR, I WOULD HAVE WASTED MY LIFE. BY PARAMASHIVA’S GRACE, I HAD A CLEAR INTELLIGENCE AND KALABHAIRAVA PROTECTED AND IS PROTECTING ME. BECAUSE OF THAT, I WITHDREW MYSELF FROM THIS WAR AND STARTED DOING THE REAL WORK I AM SUPPOSED TO DO.

*AHIMSA PARAMO DHARMAHA - NON VIOLENCE IS ULTIMATE LAW OF LIFE. NOW I ADD ONE MORE LINE TO THIS: AHIMSA PARAMO BUDDHIHI, BHAKTIHI, YUKTIHI, MUKTIHI, SHAKTIHI. NONVIOLENCE IS THE ULTIMATE STRATEGY, INTELLIGENCE, POWER AND LIBERATION.

*DECIDE NOT TO BE DELUDED BY YOUR MANLINESS. YOU WILL WASTE YOUR LIFE FIGHTING THE WAR FORCED ON YOU AND ONLY IN THE END WHETHER YOU WIN OR LOSE YOU WILL REALISE HAVE YOU HAVE LOST YOUR LIFE.

*EVEN THOUGH HE CREATED THE WHOLE UNIVERSE, PARAMASHIVA IS AWAY FROM THE UNIVERSE. THE ANTI-HINDU TERRORISTS AND ANTI-GURU HINDU MAFIA - BOTH GANGS TRIED TO MAKE ME WAGE THE WAR. THEN I WOULD NOT HAVE DELIVERED WHAT I AM SUPPOSED TO DELIVER.

*BY THE GRACE OF PARAMASHIVA, I HAD CLARITY ABOUT WHAT FOR I HAPPENED. AND GREATEST POWER KALABHAIRAVA GAVE ME IS THE ABILITY TO FORGIVE, TO BE NONVIOLENT, NOT TO BE ANGRY OR AGITIATED OR DELUDED IN THE NAME OF MANLINESS AND ALL THE STUPID HUMAN PLAIN DELUSION, BUT TO BE FEROCIOUS ABOUT WHAT I AM SUPPOSED TO DO FOR THE WORLD.
